title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 1006.5 - Penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 1006.5 - Penalties

State Regulations

Any manufacturer who violates any of the provisions of, or
who fails to perform any duty imposed by this Part shall be liable, in the case
of a first violation, for a civil penalty not to exceed five thousand dollars. In the case of a second or any subsequent violation, the liability shall be for
a civil penalty not to exceed ten thousand dollars for each such
violation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
1006.5

Adopted

New

York State Register May 18, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 20, eff. 5/18/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
